headline.0: 10 Reasons Why Jordan Is So Much More Than Petra
headline.1: The Amazing Way This Hospital Is Fighting Physician Burnout

short_description.0: Maybe you've seen Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade as he travels on horse to reveal Petra's Treasury carved out of its rock surroundings. In some ways this was Petra's unveiling to the world, and perhaps Jordan's unveiling as a tourist destination.
short_description.1: "[Compassion-based care] does go against an old style of medicine where it was just, 'Go go go, stay tough, don't be impacted

authors.0:
Adam Pervez, Contributor
PhD Student and World Traveler
